name: FestivalFox
tag_list: festivals, europe, culture, entertainment, music, film, food, heritage
overview:
FestivalFox is the European Cultural network connecting festivals to audience to artisits.

FestivalFox is building a cultural network accross Europe to help promote events and festivals to local and global audiences. Running in 17 languages, FestivalFox is a social network whereby cultural events can list their event’s info onto a platform that will better connect them Audience and Artists. The interface is designed to help Audience connect to the cultural events adn to discover new activies based on their interests. Audience can also keep track of artists who have been featured at these events. Festivalfox will also provide a platform to better facilitate people to get to their events and to learn about vast cultural interests both entertaining and educational.
